title: Mac Client won't open
body: If i leave the game open for a long time, I'll get a pop up that says the game can't reconnect and it gives me the option of exiting the game.  If I then exit the game, I cannot get the client to open, and I have to completely reinstall the game.  This is the 2nd time this has occurred in 2 days.  Please look in to this matter.

replies.body: Hey there, it sounds like you have a combination of issues here, the first being your connection becoming unstable and failing to reach the game server or relaunching the client.   You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, but do so in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  The other could be some pc stress while running idle, but a pc restart may help.
